game.name: Breachway
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 우주선 업그레이드와 승무원 관리가 생존의 핵심인 이 로그라이크 SF 덱빌딩 게임에서 은하계를 탐험하세요. 자원 생성을 최적화하고, 격렬한 턴제 전투를 벌이고, 끊임없이 진화하는 위협에 맞서며 ‘신호’를 찾으세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore the galaxy in this deckbuilding, sci-fi roguelike where ship upgrades and crew management are key to your survival. Optimize resource generation, engage in intense turn-based battles, and take on ever-growing threats as you seek out The Signal.

reviewHighlights.text: It's a very sad thumbs down, because I really *want* to like this game, but 150 hours and a year later, it just doesn't feel like it's coming together...
